name: Creamy Beef Pasta
linkName: *FIVE* MUST TRY INSTANT POT RECIPES | Great For Beginners & Real Weeknight Dinners | Julia Pacheco
notes: Serve sprinked with basil leaves and Parmesian cheese. These make 5 servings and they taste even better the next day. I freeze them in one-meal containers. To defrost, I take the frozen container and place it into a sling and add 1 cup of water or beef broth and set the setting to steam for about 25 minutes. I then remove the water from the liner and saute for a few minutes if necessary.

instructions.description: Add tablespoon of olive oil into liner (maybe a tad more than 1 tblsp)
Add one chopped onion
Saute for about 3 minutes to make translucent
Add 1 lb of ground beef
Saute until meat has browned
Use a paper towel to soak up extra fat from meat
Add a tablespoon of Italian Seasoning
Add a teaspoon of salt or garlic salt
Add a teaspoon of garlic powder
Add one or two large chopped Green or Red Pepper (optional)
Add a couple of chopped Celery stalks (optional)
Add about 10-16 baby carrots chopped
Add a tablespoon of tomato paste
Stir until the tomato paste melts down
Add 12 oz package of Barilla Mini Farfalle bowtie pasta (do not stir, a layer on top of meat) (Use 4.125 liquid cups == 12 oz weight)
Add 24 oz of Kroger Tomato + Basil Pasta Sauce (do not stir)
Add 3 cups of water (do not stir)
Make sure any pasta pieces are submerged (do not stir)
Pressure Cook (high): 6 minutes
Quick Release
Stir thoroughly
Add 3 tablespoons of cream cheese
Add 1 cup of Parmesean Cheese
Add 1/2 cup of whole milk, half-and-half or cream or Almond milk
Stir thoroughly
